de.rwth.i9.palm.analytics.algorithm.lda

Interface Lda

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LDAJob

    public interface Lda
    An implementation of the LDA Algorithm. For the details regarding this algorithm check: https://www.cs.princeton.edu/~blei/papers/BleiNgJordan2003.pdf Automatic Bag of Words extraction from a text corpus

    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceData

        cc.mallet.types.InstanceList getInstanceData(String path,
                                           String purpose,
                                           String specify)
        Parameters:
        path - - Specifies where the list of documents is
        purpose - - Specifies one of the following: {Authors, Publications, Conferences, Years}
        specify - - Define {Trainer, Infer}
        Returns:
        List of instances in the format: purpose-specify.mallet

      • setNumberTopics

        cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel setNumberTopics(int numTopics)
        Parameters:
        numTopics - - Number of topics from which a documents is composed
        Returns:
        Number of topics specified as a parameter

      • getNumTopics

        int getNumTopics(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m)
        Parameters:
        m - - Parallel Topic Model already estimated (created)
        Returns:
        - Number of topics that were predefined on LDA implementation (50)

      • createModel

        cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel createModel(String path,
                                              String purpose,
                                              String specify,
                                              int numTopics,
                                              int numWords)
        Parameters:
        path -
        purpose -
        specify -
        numTopics - - Number of topics from which a document is composed
        numWords - - Number of Words shown in a topic (from the implementation its one lower)
        Returns:
        - Topic Model trained with the specific parameters alphaSum = 50.0 (alpha = alphaSum/numTopics) beta = 0.01 ( beta = 1/numTopics

      • DocTopicMapper

        void DocTopicMapper(String path,
                  String purpose,
                  String specify)
                    throws IOException
        Parameters:
        path -
        purpose -
        specify -
        Throws:
        IOException - Used when the results were on file format. Mapping list of topics with topic distribution for each instance.

      • TopicInferencer

        double[] TopicInferencer(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel trainedModel,
                       String path,
                       String purpose,
                       String specify,
                       String docID)
                         throws IOException
        Parameters:
        trainedModel -
        path -
        purpose -
        specify -
        docID - - specifies the id of document in the format found on db.
        Returns:
        Array of doubles specifying the percentage of "appearance" of that topic[i] on this document The document is entered as a new instance on the existing vocabulary and uses the trained model
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getTopicDocument

        HashMap<String,String> getTopicDocument(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m,
                                      int docID,
                                      int max,
                                      double threshold,
                                      int numTopics,
                                      int numWords)
        Parameters:
        m -
        docID - - integer referring to instance (from InstanceList) responsible for that document
        max - - specifies the maximal number of topics generated for a corpus
        threshold - - minimal topic distribution allowed to be considered significant of a document
        numTopics -
        numWords -
        Returns:
        - A HashMap where key: TopicID as String (used later to be mapped to db-version id) value: Bag of words for that topic

      • getTopicWeight

        HashMap<String,Double> getTopicWeight(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m,
                                    int docID,
                                    int max,
                                    double threshold,
                                    int numTopics,
                                    int numWords)
        Parameters:
        m -
        docID -
        max -
        threshold -
        numTopics -
        numWords -
        Returns:
        A HashMap where key: TopicID as String (used later to be mapped to db-version id) value: Double specified the % of assignment of that topic to specific document

      • getAllDocumentTopics

        HashMap<String,List<String>> getAllDocumentTopics(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m,
                                                int docID,
                                                int max,
                                                double threshold,
                                                int numTopics)
        Parameters:
        m -
        docID -
        max -
        threshold -
        numTopics -
        Returns:
        A HashMap where key: TopicID as String (used later to be mapped to db-version id) value: List of Strings specifying topic ID "-" % of assignment of that topic to specific document Idea: Get all the significant topics for a specific document

        Parameters:
        m -
        numTopics -
        Returns:
        This method is part of mallet. Used to sort the words per topic accordingly to their significance
